org.ogcs.app

接口 Session

  • 所有超级接口:
    Releasable
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultSession

    public interface Session
extends Releasable
    Session.

    When player connect to server. server will be create a session for everybody. The session control the connection and player's data.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ProxyCallback callback() 
      io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx()
      Get the Netty's ChannelHandlerContext
      Connector getConnector()
      Get the player
      boolean isOnline()
      Is session is active
      void offline()
      Will be invoked when player offline.
      void setConnector(Connector connector)
      Set player.
      void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object msg)
      Send message back without callback.

      Send message back with callback.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.ogcs.app.Releasable

        release

    • 方法详细资料

      • ctx

        io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx()
        Get the Netty's ChannelHandlerContext
        返回:
        Return Netty's ChannelHandlerContext

      • isOnline

        boolean isOnline()
        Is session is active
        返回:
        Return true if the session is active. otherwise false.

      • getConnector

        Connector getConnector()
        Get the player
        返回:
        Return player

      • setConnector

        void setConnector(Connector connector)
        Set player. After player login, should set the player.
        参数:
        connector - The player

      • writeAndFlush

        void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object msg)
        Send message back without callback.
        参数:
        msg - The message will be send

      • writeAndFlush

        void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object message,
                   io.netty.channel.ChannelFutureListener listener)
        Send message back with callback.
        参数:
        message - The message will be send
        listener - The callback

      • offline

        void offline()
        Will be invoked when player offline.

      • callback

        ProxyCallback callback()
